subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: With a win over Denis Istomin at the Sony Ericsson Open, Novak Djokovic has the best start to a season by a male player since Ivan Lendl in 1986.
snippet: With a win over Denis Istomin at the Sony Ericsson Open, Novak Djokovic has the best start to a season by a male player since Ivan Lendl in 1986.
